bibl.title: Additional Remarks on Blemmyes, Beja and Eastern Desert Ware.
bibl.note: Supplement to: Hans BARNARD, Alek N. DOOLEY and Kym F. FAULL, New Data on the Eastern Desert Ware from Sayala (Lower Nubia) in the Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna, Ägypten und Levante 15 (2005) pp. 49-64, figg. - An earlier version of this article was presented at the 58th Annual Meeting of the American Research Center in Egypt, Toledo (Ohio), 20-22 April 2007.
